name: Rush
description: Perform a normal attack when approaching an enemy

name: Double Slash
description: Attack with a melee weapon twice

name: Flame Chase
description: Follows up with a fire attack if a fire attack is targeted on nearby target

name: Lightning Chase
description: Follows up with an electric attack if an electric attack is targeted on nearby target

name: Ice Chase
description: Follows up with an ice attack if an ice attack is targeted on nearby target

name: Wide Chase
description: A buff that causes chasers to become area-of-effect damage

name: Guardian
description: Wielding a shield increases avoid for neighboring party members

name: Rapid Fire
description: Attack with a ranged weapon twice

name: Leading Blow
description: Attack once. If target has ailment or binds, follow up with a second attack scaling with the amount of ailment or binds.

name: Charge
description: For this turn, perform a normal attack when approaching an enemy. Target is pushed, destroying weak cover.

name: Cross Counter
description: For the next turn, when the target uses a body part, attack and bind that part
